titles.title: A resolution designating March 27, 2019, as "National Assistive Technology Awareness Day".
A resolution designating March 27, 2019, as "National Assistive Technology Awareness Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
This resolution supports the designation of National Assistive Technology Awareness Day.
It also commends assistive technology specialists, program coordinators, organizations, and researchers for their assistance in helping people with disabilities to access such technology.
